title: Portable and accurate diagnostics for COVID-19:
author: Everardo González-González, Grissel Trujillo-de Santiago, Itzel Montserrat Lara, Mayorga, Sergio Omar Martínez-Chapa, Mario Moisés Alvarez,* 7 8 1 Centro de Biotecnología-FEMSA, Tecnologico de Monterrey, CP 64849, Monterrey, 9 Nuevo León, México 10 2 Departamento de Bioingeniería, Tecnologico de Monterrey, CP 64849, Monterrey, Nuevo 11 León, México 12 3 Departamento de Ingeniería Mecátrónica y Eléctrica, Tecnologico de Monterrey, CP 13 64849, Monterrey, Nuevo León, México 14 15 *Corresponding authors. abstract: The COVID-19 pandemic has crudely demonstrated the value of massive and rapid 19 diagnostics. By the first week of April, more than 900,000 positive cases of COVID-19 20 have been reported worldwide, although this number could be greatly underestimated. In
